member.name: IDeskBand2.CanRenderComposited

summary.para: Indicates the deskband's ability to be displayed as translucent.
summary.div: Important You should use thumbnail toolbars in new development in place of desk bands, which are not supported as of Windows 7.

member.param: When this method returns, contains a BOOL indicating ability.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
